title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5700.1 - Use of facilities conditional
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5700.1 - Use of facilities conditional

State Regulations

The use of facilities by any person or vehicle shall be
deemed to be conditional upon payment of the prescribed toll herein set forth
and upon observance of the rules and regulations as adopted; all rights, privileges, licenses and permits, express or implied, granted by the authority
for the use of the facilities, shall be deemed to be revocable; and each such
right, privilege, license or permit shall, at the option of the authority, be
deemed to be revoked and cancelled by and upon the breach of any such rule or
regulation, or the violation of any applicable laws or ordinances, while using
the facilities. Persons or vehicles violating any such rule or regulation, as
well as any or all other vehicles owned or operated by such person or by the
owner and/or operator of such vehicle, may be excluded from the facilities
permanently or for a specified time. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5700.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
